Comments_List: Through this course, I gained more proficiency in the language. I grew more in my knowledge of conversational Yoruba ways of speaking, and I learned different intonations.
This course is great because its provides a platform where you can learn based on classroom discussion, comprehensive homework assignments, and hopeful teachers and teaching assistants.
I would definitely recommend this course, especially to a Nigerian students. It is important to know a language of your country, and this is a very prominent one.
